title: AccountTypeEnum
description: The enumeration values to qualify the type of account.

oneOf.title: AggregateClient
oneOf.description: Aggregate client account, as defined under ESMA MiFIR.

oneOf.title: Client
oneOf.description: The account contains trading activity or positions that belong to a client of the firm that opened the account.

oneOf.title: House
oneOf.description: The account contains proprietary trading activity or positions, belonging to the firm that is the owner of the account.
